properties.displayName: Suspicious Windows Update Agent Empty Cmdline
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine endswith "Wuauclt" or ProcessCommandLine endswith "Wuauclt.exe") and (FolderPath endswith "\\Wuauclt.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "Wuauclt.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: etects suspicious Windows Update Agent activity in which a wuauclt.exe process command line doesn't contain any command line flag
